page.title: 13MEDICAL PRACTICE
page.content: MEDICAL PRACTICE STAUNTON ON WYE The practice based on Staunton and Weobly covers 200sq miles with 5000 patients. (all NHS) It is run by 4 doctors, with locum help. Each works a 12 hour day with 1 1/2 free days a week, and alternate w/e and night duties. There are also weekly surg- eries at 5 other village centres. Covering this area means a lot of travelling, difficult and tiring in winter but compensated by the country- side. The practice has no cottage hospital beds so patients go to Hereford or Cheltenham. Most births and deaths are in hospital. Two district nurses cover the area their workload growing as patients leave hospital earlier and geriatric population increases due to the area's popularity for retirement.
